A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Honestly? Meh. Some parts were cool\, others were just WHY. They were trying way too hard to appease to kids with their many\, many gimmicks. The slapstick jokes just aren’t Star Wars. They work for marvel\, but Star Wars is Beyond that — or they used to be. The franchise has always been something to look up to\, the intricate storyline and badassery always having a seemingly flawless finesse. Now it’s been overshadowed as a joke. Totally disappointing.
